data.title: Düsseldorf Hbf → Hattingen (Ruhr) by Fast Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Düsseldorf Hbf to Hattingen (Ruhr) in 49m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Düsseldorf Hbf to Hattingen (Ruhr) today.
data.text:
If you want to know more about the journey from Düsseldorf Hbf to Hattingen (Ruhr) by train, look no further!

The average journey time from Düsseldorf Hbf to Hattingen (Ruhr) by train is 56 minutes, although on the fastest services it can take just 49 minutes. Around 40 trains per day travel the 20 miles (33 km) between these two destinations. You'll need to make 1 change along the way to Hattingen (Ruhr). During your journey, you'll either be travelling with ICE or DB, as they are the main operators of services on this route.

Book train tickets from Düsseldorf Hbf to Hattingen (Ruhr) in advance instead of buying them on the day and they can start from €19.20. We'll always highlight the cheapest prices when you search in our Journey Planner.

Ready to book? Start your search for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times, as well as tips on how to find cheap train tickets.
